1.caption_en:
A white rectangular banner outlined in lime-green with inward-pointing triangular tabs on both sides and the word "RATIO" centered in dark gray. It resembles a labeled callout or UI badge.

{
  "artifact_type": "graphic banner",
  "description": "White rounded rectangle outlined in lime-green with triangular tabs extending inward from the left and right; contains centered text 'RATIO'.",
  "colors": [
    "lime-green",
    "white",
    "dark gray"
  ],
  "shapes": [
    "rounded rectangle",
    "left inward-pointing triangle",
    "right inward-pointing triangle"
  ],
  "text": {
    "content": "RATIO",
    "case": "uppercase",
    "color": "dark gray",
    "position": "centered",
    "style": "sans-serif-like"
  },
  "layout": "horizontal",
  "notes": "Text sits slightly below the rectangle vertical midpoint; triangular tabs overlap the rectangle border."
}
